column5: This is the biggest carp i have ever caught!!!  Really starting to like this carp fishing stuff.  Took me about twenty minutes to reel it in and stretch the heck out of my 8lbs mono.  Me and a buddy caught 5 carp in 2 hours (better then i do for most types of fish).  Sorry for the short report, but i didn't have much time.          Thanks for checking out my post.   lovetofish
nice fish! ... it's gotta be tough landing that beast with all the snags
Congrats on the PB!!! Any measurements?? length or weight?  Just curious.  Looks like a monster from your pic...good going!
I'm guessing somewhere in the mid 20lbs range and maybe 30" long
